Posts.Content: WorldMK wrote: I am seeing a BC surgeon and doing biopsy on Monday. Ultra sound showed posterior acoustic shadowing. Does anyone know what I should expect ? What's the process like? How long to wait for results ? I am beyond terrified. My mum died from BC less than 2y ago and I have a small baby: Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Biopsy monday WorldMK WorldMK

Posts.Content: Jul 13, 2016 06:59AM WorldMK wrote: Forwhoever will read here is an update: My biopsy came negative for cancer. The shadow was caused my a milk cyst caused by breastfeeding. So inspite of what sounded like alarmist and serious report, there was no cancer. I wanted to write this for everyone who may read reports and spend hours Googling medical terminology and diagnosing themselves. My husband said to me ' no one ever goes on forums to tell the good news so when you google posterior acoustic shadowing, only the serious stuff Come up.' So I wanted to say that I am one of those who had PAS and biopsy came clear. Wish you all the best. X
Posts.Title: Biopsy monday WorldMK WorldMK
